body_text:
I think this fails because includes isn't bound to listB. I tested in the web console:
>> var list1 = [1, 2, 3]
undefined
>> var list2 = [2, 3, 4]
undefined
>> list1.filter(list2.includes)
TypeError: can't convert undefined to object
body:
I think this fails because `includes` isn't bound to `listB`. I tested in the web console:

```js
>> var list1 = [1, 2, 3]
undefined
>> var list2 = [2, 3, 4]
undefined
>> list1.filter(list2.includes)
TypeError: can't convert undefined to object
```
body_html:
I think this fails because includes isn't bound to listB. I tested in the web console:

>> var list1 = [1, 2, 3]
undefined
>> var list2 = [2, 3, 4]
undefined
>> list1.filter(list2.includes)
TypeError: can't convert undefined to object
